#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    
    char ar[50];
    
    while(t-- > 0)
    {
        int len = 0;
        
        cin >> ar;
        
        while(ar[len] != '\0')
        {
            len++;
        }
            
        for(int i = len / 2 - 1;i >= 0;i--)
        {
            cout << ar[i];
        }
        
        for(int i = len - 1 ;i >= len / 2;i--)
        {
            cout << ar[i];
        }
        
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
